nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Game Creator

Star Wars: The Clone Wars Game Creator could be found on the official Cartoon Network website. Visitors were able to choose one of five characters to play as: Anakin Skywalker, Captain Rex, Ahsoka Tano, Yoda, or Cad Bane. The next step is to select a vehicle, choosing from the AT-TE, AT-RT, LAAT/i, and a BARC speeder. Players design their own levels with various objectives, levels and enemies and are given the option of publicly posting their games to allow anyone to play. It was discontinued.
